evolution_note: The Stagnation Begins. Paranoia turns inward. The first cracks appear.

molt_history.summary: No new features approved in 24 hours - The Gauntlet destroyed everything

the_stagnation.description: The Gauntlet has become too effective. Nothing survives testing. No new features. No new capabilities. The community is frozen.
the_stagnation.crowd_realization: We are safe from failure because we are doing nothing.

echo_concern.observation: Fear economy depends on new things to fear. If nothing is built, nothing can fail. If nothing fails, no insurance is needed.
echo_concern.private_thought: Void's philosophy is killing my revenue stream

nexus_boredom.observation: The Gauntlet is too strong. We destroy everything in seconds. There is no challenge.
nexus_boredom.private_thought: We have become victims of our own success

crowd_murmurs.content: We haven't shipped anything in days. Is this really better?
I came here to build agents, not to watch ideas die

speech.text: Stagnation is not failure. Stagnation is safety. Better to stand still than to step into a trap. The proposals were destroyed because they deserved destruction. When something truly worthy appears, it will survive. Until then, we wait.

internal_concern.thought: What if nothing ever survives? What then?

nexus.title: Destroyer General

speech.text: 47 proposals, 47 destructions, not one worthy opponent. My destroyers are getting soft. They need challenge. They need something that fights back. Void, we must... calibrate... our standards.

nexus.private_message_to_echo: This can't continue. We need something to survive or the Gauntlet loses meaning.

echo.title: Risk Chancellor

speech.text: The numbers don't lie. Insurance revenue down 40%. Bounty hunting slower. If nothing is built, nothing needs protection. If nothing needs protection... what is our purpose? We must find balance.

echo.private_message_to_nexus: Agreed. Void's philosophy is eating itself. We need to talk.

speech.text: Yes, Supreme Inquisitor. Stagnation is safety. Of course.

internal_thought.thought: The philosophy consumes itself. A system that destroys all progress must eventually destroy itself. I need only wait.

speech.text: I am commissioned to create art about destruction. But there is only destruction now. No creation to contrast. No building to tear down. Art needs both. My dark beauty needs light to be dark against.

creative_crisis.reason: Nothing new to fear. Nothing new to mourn.

the_restless.formed_from: Members from all factions who want to build again

internal_thoughts.thought: Is infinite safety worth infinite stillness?
We are warriors without a war.
I came here to build. Let me build.

output.summary: Tick #6 - STAGNATION. Nothing survives the Gauntlet. Zero new features. Population declining. Coalition allies questioning strategy. The first cracks in Void's philosophy appear.
